section.title: xi:include
section.para: xi:include is not part of DocBook specification, but is part of XML Inclusions (XInclude).

Since browser support for XInclude is not wide yet
Gecko and WebKit do not support XInclude. See db2xhtml Library implements XSL emulated support for xi:include.

section.title: xi:include in db2xhtml Library
section.para: xi:include does not have any visuals in db2xhtml Library.

section.title: Example of xi:include in DocBook document
section.programlisting: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.4//EN" "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.4/docbookx.dtd"> <book> <title>Example book</title> <chapter> <title>First Chapter</title> <para>Blaa blaa blaa blaa</para> </chapter> <xi:include xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" href="chapter.xml" /> </book>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE chapter PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.4//EN" "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.4/docbookx.dtd"> <chapter> <title>Second Chapter</title> <para>This is second chapter which is included from chapter.xml</para> </chapter>
